Params: {1: "I don't remember much of what happened after that.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '3.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000029', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But to be honest, I felt at peace for the first time.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '4.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000031', 6: '1'}
{1: "Because everything I've ever wanted is already here.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '3', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000032', 6: '1'}
{1: 'My hands finally... held what is mine.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '4.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000033', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I am the Lucia you gave life to.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000035', 6: '1'}

{1: 'The day when I touched your hand and felt your warmth... that was the moment I truly came alive, alive to everything in the world.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '7.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000036', 6: '1'}
{1: '—The Lucia created by our shared memories.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '5.3', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000037', 6: '1'}
{1: "So even if I fade... even if I'm no longer myself, it'll be okay.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '3.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000038', 6: '1'}
{1: "Because I'll be reborn the moment I touch you.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '4', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000039', 6: '1'}
